document.masterDocTitle: A Checklist of the Aspidogastrea (Platyhelminthes: Trematoda) of the World

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A Checklist of the Aspidogastrea (Platyhelminthes: Trematoda) of the World

bibRefCitation.author: Leidy
bibRefCitation.refString: Leidy, J. (1857) Observations on Entozoa found in Naiades. Proceedings of the Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia, 9, 18.

subSubSection.paragraph:

(Bivalvia); freshwater; junction of inner gills and visceral mass; NEA; USA (North

Amblema plicata
(Bivalvia); freshwater; inner surface of gills, suprabranchial cavities; NEA; USA (North

Amphinaias
(=
Quadrula
)
pustulosa
for
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Amphinaias infucata
(Bivalvia); freshwater; junction of foot and inner gills, within gills, suprabranchial

Remark: Probably,
A . ferox
is an incidental host (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Elliptio jayensis
(Bivalvia); freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Lampsilis cariosa
(Bivalvia); freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

(Bivalvia); freshwater; gills; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Flook & Ubelaker 1972
; Vitrine &
Causey 1975
;
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Lampsilis ovata
(Bivalvia); freshwater; junction of inner gills and visceral mass, on foot, pericardial cavity; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Nelson et al . 1975
; Vitrine &
Causey 1975
;
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Remark:
Osborn ( 1905 )
was originally published in
Osborn ( 1903 )
.

Plectomerus dombeyanus
(Bivalvia); freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Potamilus amphichaenus
(Bivalvia); freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Potamilus ohiensis
(Bivalvia); freshwater; unspecified site of infection; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Hendrix et al . 1985
).

Pyganodon cataracta
(Bivalvia); freshwater; mantle cavity, on kidney and foot; NEA; USA (North America ) (
Leidy 1857
, 1858 ;
Skryabin 1952
;
Dollfus 1958 b
;
Yamaguti 1963
;
Hendrix et al . 1985
). Remark:
Leidy ( 1857 )
described
C . insignis
from this host and
P . lacustris
.

Hendrix et al . 1985
).

).
